meanings.definition: A handrail supported by balusters, especially on a staircase.
meanings.sent1: Hold onto the banisters while going up the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The banisters on the staircase were painted white.
meanings.sent3: The banisters on the stairs looked like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers glided along the banisters as if they were a musical instrument.
meanings.sent5: The banisters creaked softly under the weight of the children playing on them.

meanings.definition: The balusters of a staircase collectively.
meanings.sent1: The banisters were made of wood and metal.
meanings.sent2: She held tightly to the banisters as she descended the stairs.
meanings.sent3: The banisters whispered secrets to each other in the quiet of the night.
meanings.sent4: The banisters stood like soldiers guarding the staircase.
meanings.sent5: The banisters gleamed in the sunlight, casting shadows on the floor.
